question: Roh Tae-moon, was recently appointed as the Chief of the Mobile phone division of which famous company?
explanation:
South-Korea based leading Multinational Electronics Company, Samsung Electronics recently appointed Roh Tae-moon as its new Mobile Chief. The 52-year old engineer and Samsungâ€™s youngest President, Roh is to take over the role from the Co-CEO, DJ Koh. DJ Koh will serve as the CEO of the IT & Mobile Communications (IM) business.
